translation.en: [man over radio] Jane, go do your rounds. I'll come down and cover the desk.
translation.ko: 제인, 순찰 돌러 가요 그 자리는 내가 볼게요

translation.en: [man] This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.ko: 포틀랜드 경찰국 소속 웨이드 롤린스 형사입니다

translation.en: Leave your name and number, and I'll get back to you.
translation.ko: 이름과 전화번호를 남겨주시면 최대한 빨리 연락드리겠습니다

translation.en: Detective, uh… [sniffles] This is Andrea Bowen again.
I know it's late, but could you call me back when you can?
translation.ko: 시간이 늦은 건 알지만 이거 들으면 전화 좀 주실래요?

translation.en: [shakily] I'm just really scared, and I just…
I feel like he's still watching me.
[man] Andrea, this is how the world ends.

translation.ko: 도와줘요! 누구라도 좀 도와줘요, 안 돼!

translation.en: -[music continues over speakers] -[woman] Hi, sorry. I had a bottle of wine, but I drank it,
translation.ko: 미안, 와인 한 병 샀는데 내가 마셔버리는 바람에

translation.en: so I brought you this plant, which I'm now noticing is dead.
translation.ko: 선물로 화분 가져왔는데 지금 보니까 이미 죽었네

translation.en: I know, I'm sorry. It's just--
Originally, you weren't coming, and then Scott invited him,
translation.ko: 네가 안 오겠다고 해서 스콧이 브라이언을 불렀대

translation.en: and I had absolutely no idea. So…
tell everyone you're not feeling well, you know?
translation.ko: 몸이 안 좋아서 못 왔다고 하면 되겠지?

translation.en: I think I need a glass of wine.
She told me a week ago that you weren't coming.
translation.ko: 일주일 전에 지나한테 안 온다고 들었거든

translation.en: You don't know what's happening, so walk away.
translation.ko: 상황 파악 안 되면 그냥 가줘

translation.en: This is Jenn. As in, "The Jenn."
translation.ko: 이쪽은 젠이에요 제가 말씀드렸던 그 젠이요

translation.en: -Collin Meade. Very nice to meet you. -[woman] He's magical. Changed my life.
translation.ko: - 콜린 미드예요, 반갑습니다 - 내 인생을 바꿔준 마술사셔

translation.en: I got the promotion, like, a month after working with you?
translation.ko: 박사님이랑 치료 시작하고 한 달 뒤에 승진했던가요?

translation.en: And this house. You should totally go see him.
translation.ko: 이렇게 집도 샀고요 너도 박사님 사무실에 가봐

translation.en: -That's what you say, right? -You know where the ice tongs are?
translation.ko: - 박사님이 그렇게 말씀하셨죠? - 자기야, 얼음 집게 어디 있어?

translation.en: -It's by the ice bucket, Scott. -[Scott] They're not there.
translation.ko: - 얼음통 옆에 있겠지 - 거기 없으니까 묻지

translation.en: Babe. Seriously, every time! I put them beside the ice thing.
translation.ko: 자기야, 매번 이럴 거야? 다른 것들이랑 같이 뒀어

translation.en: Didn't know therapists could hang out with their clients.
translation.ko: 심리 치료사는 환자하고 밖에서 만나면 안 되지 않아요?

translation.en: I mean, I follow the rules 99% of the time.
translation.ko: 뭐, 99%의 경우엔 저도 그 규칙을 따르죠

translation.en: -Cheers to your new house. -My new house!
translation.ko: - 건배 - 두 사람의 새집을 위하여 새집을 위하여

translation.en: -It's a stupid name, is what it is. -No, what is it?
translation.ko: - 이름을 참 웃기게도 지었어 - 그게 뭔데?

translation.en: Uh, the guys created a new software for some big audio engineer.
translation.ko: 오디오 엔지니어링사 의뢰로 새 소프트웨어를 개발한대서

translation.en: I just helped write some of the code.
Oh, no. I was just, uh--
I'm just-- Um, I'm sort of in between jobs at the moment.
translation.ko: 최근에 일 관둬서 요즘은 그냥 쉬고 있어요

translation.en: She's just being modest. Jenny is actually a killer software engineer.
translation.ko: 겸손을 떠네요 엄청 잘나가는 소프트웨어 엔지니어죠
- 한때는 두 분 같이 일했어요? - 브라이언!

translation.en: Um… Is there sesame in that?
[gasps] Oh my God! Brian, I'm so sorry.
Wow, that would've sucked if you died in our new house, dude.
translation.ko: 하마터면 우리 새집에서 저세상 가실 뻔했네

translation.en: You know what? I think I'm gonna leave this right here.
I'm headed out, but, uh, I wanted to leave you this.
translation.ko: 이만 가보려고 하는데 명함 드리고 싶어서요

translation.en: Yeah. "Viola will be here in nine minutes."
I have tried really hard not to bother you, but…
I think about you all the time, and I just--
I didn't ask you to stay away because you bother me.
translation.ko: 질척대지 말고 떨어지라고 한 적 없어

translation.en: Then don't say things like that.
When you say things like that, you make me sound like the bad guy,
translation.ko: 그렇게 말하면 꼭 내가 나쁜 사람 같잖아

translation.en: and I'm not the bad guy. I'm--
You're not the bad guy. I'm not saying you are.
I'm just-- Oh God, what am I saying? I don't know what I'm saying.
translation.ko: 내 말은… 나도 모르겠다 내가 지금 뭐라는 거야?

translation.en: Can I give you a ride home?
-I don't think that's a good id-- -[Brian] It's just a ride, Jenny.
translation.ko: - 안 그러는 게 좋을 텐데… - 그냥 태워다 주기만 할게

translation.en: -Do you plan on getting back together? -No.
I'm stupid. Oh God, I'm the most stupid.
translation.ko: 나 멍청하지? 나 같은 멍청이도 없을 거야

translation.en: Oh my gosh, you're not. You're not stupid. You're just-- You're--
translation.ko: 뭐래, 하나도 안 멍청해 너는 그냥…

translation.en: And for the most part, I hate to say this to you,
translation.ko: 웬만하면 이 말은 안 하려고 했는데

translation.en: What am I supposed to say to that?
[clicks tongue] I think you should see Dr. Meade.
-Gina, I'll never do that. -You met him. He's tall, handsome.
translation.ko: - 내가 못 살아, 말도 꺼내지 마 - 어젯밤에 본 잘생긴 분 있잖아

translation.en: Hear me out, okay? You're isolating. You're unemployed.
translation.ko: - 됐어 - 그러지 말고 들어봐 넌 고립된 데다가 일도 안 하고 있어

translation.en: And you slept with your ex-fiancé last night.
-Your life is a vortex of crap right now. -This is so much fun.
translation.ko: - 너 지금 엉망으로 살고 있어 - 이런 얘기 하니까 좋다

translation.en: Can you just go for me, please?
I made you an appointment for Friday.
translation.ko: - 딱 한 번만이야 - 그래 금요일로 예약 잡아놨어

translation.en: You should've seen me when I started with him.
translation.ko: 저 여기 처음 왔을 때 완전 가관이었거든요

translation.en: Whatever you're here for, Dr. Meade will fix it.
translation.ko: 무슨 일로 왔는지 몰라도 미드 박사님이 고쳐주실 거예요

translation.en: You know that having fish reduces stress and lowers blood pressure?
translation.ko: 물고기 키우면 스트레스도 혈압도 낮아지는 거 알아요?

translation.en: At least that's what I've heard. Who knows if it's true.
But I do find them calming.
I'm so glad you decided to come in.
[Jenn] I don't feel motivated to do anything.
Or, like, I should probably stop drinking. I should probably exercise more.
I should probably get eight hours of sleep at night.
translation.ko: 밤에 8시간은 자야 할 텐데 의욕이 없어요

translation.en: bad habits come from deeper issues.
What might that be for you?
Tell me about you and Brian.
He's nice. He's sweet, he's funny, he's smart. It's Brian. I don't know.
translation.ko: 착하고 다정하고 재밌고 똑똑하죠 브라이언에 대해서는 그게 다예요

translation.en: We lived together. We worked together. It was like a whole thing.
translation.ko: 같이 일하고, 같이 살면서 모든 걸 함께했던 셈이죠

translation.en: Actually, I was six months along, so it was a stillbirth.
I got to spend 33 minutes with him.
Brian and I were engaged, and, uh,
you know, we just couldn't really figure it out after that. So…
translation.ko: 그 일이 있고 난 뒤로 둘 다 갈피를 못 잡았죠

translation.en: Do you have anything after this?
I'm just not a giving-away-control person,
translation.ko: 스스로에 대한 통제력을 타인한테 넘겨주기 싫을 뿐이에요

translation.en: Sure. But here's the wonderful thing about hypnotherapy. All right?
translation.ko: 오히려 그런 면에서 최면 치료가 빛을 발해요

translation.en: Only you can control your subconscious.
translation.ko: 나의 잠재의식은 오로지 나만이 통제할 수 있어요

translation.en: -[Jenn sighs] -So, you're in control the whole time.
And it's an excellent tool for people who have suffered…
translation.ko: 힘든 시간을 보낸 분들께 아주 좋은 치료법이고요

translation.en: Worst case scenario, it'll stop you from further destroying your poor fingers.
translation.ko: 치료 효과가 기대에 못 미치더라도 애꿎은 손은 안 뜯게 될걸요

translation.en: and his name was, uh, Dr. Xavier Sullivan.
He was a brilliant mind. He would say,
translation.ko: 굉장히 똑똑하신 분인데 이런 말씀을 하신 적 있어요

translation.en: "Prosaic methods are reserved for the unimaginative."
"One in search of lasting results dares to open the mind."
translation.ko: '영속적인 결과를 추구하는 자는 용기를 내어 마음을 연다'

translation.en: Just wanna be happy again, you know?
I want you to concentrate on the light.
[Meade] Feel the weight of your body as it melts into the couch,
translation.ko: 내 몸의 무게를 느끼며 서서히 소파에 녹아들어 갑니다

translation.en: until you arrive at the top of your head.
I want you to find yourself
[sighs] I don't know. I don't really remember anything.
I think you might be more open to suggestibility
translation.ko: 미리 우려했던 것과는 달리 암시를 받아들일 준비가 됐네요

translation.en: They called me right after I left. I start in two weeks.
translation.ko: 건물에서 나오자마자 전화받고 2주 후에 출근하기로 했어

translation.en: Are you gonna do some yoga with me, or you're just gonna lie there?
translation.ko: 나랑 요가를 하긴 할 거니? 계속 누워있을 거야?

translation.en: This is Shavasana. It is yoga.
How many sessions did you have with Dr. Meade?
I don't know. Maybe, um, once a week for about three months now.
translation.ko: 몰라, 일주일에 한 번씩 가 이제 3개월쯤 됐나?

translation.en: I've asked him to do hypnosis twice.
translation.ko: 나도 최면 치료 받고 싶다고 두 번이나 말했는데

translation.en: It's not fair. I wanna conquer all of my fears.
translation.ko: 왜 나는 안 해줘? 모든 두려움을 정복하고 싶어

translation.en: It's a compliment. You've already conquered all your fears.
Hi, have you seen me and spiders? Didn't think so.
translation.ko: 내가 거미 보면 어쩌는지 몰라? 아직 멀었어

translation.en: -You look fantastic as ever. -Oh, thanks. You too.
translation.ko: - 늘 그렇듯 빛이 나네요 - 고마워요, 박사님도요

translation.en: Haven't seen you in a couple of weeks. You're not, uh… you're not avoiding me?
translation.ko: 우리 2주쯤 못 봤는데 저 피하는 건 아니죠?

translation.en: Oh, no. I've been meaning to schedule. It's just I've been busy--
translation.ko: 설마요, 예약 잡아야죠 제가 요즘 바빴어서…

translation.en: -I had no doubt. -You didn't think I could do it?
translation.ko: - 이야, 역시 능력자였네요 - 만년 백수일 줄 알았어요?

translation.en: May I buy you a celebratory coffee?
I did yoga with Gina, and I meditated last night.
It was three minutes, and I thought about my dead plants, but I did it.
translation.ko: 3분 내내 죽은 화분을 생각했지만 아무튼 명상하긴 했어요

translation.en: You're one of those people that wakes up at 5:00 a.m.
And one of those who hangs out with his clients but is very private.
translation.ko: 환자랑 밖에서 만나기도 하지만 자기 얘기는 절대 안 하고요

translation.en: Uh, I was married once to the love of my life, Amy.
translation.ko: 제 인생을 바쳐 사랑한 여자와 결혼한 적이 있고요 에이미요

translation.en: We were happy, but she died.
"Wanna make God laugh, tell him your plans."
But, Jennifer, the important thing to remember
is that being a victim is a choice,
translation.ko: 피해자로 사느냐는 내 선택에 달린 문제예요

translation.en: and we can let our hardships define us,
translation.ko: 고난이 나를 좀먹고 나를 정의하도록 내버려 두거나

translation.en: consume us, or we can accept
translation.ko: 고난이 나를 좀먹고 나를 정의하도록 내버려 두거나 아니면 이번 생에 내게 주어진 특별한 능력을 받아들여서

translation.en: the extraordinary abilities that we have in this life
translation.ko: 아니면 이번 생에 내게 주어진 특별한 능력을 받아들여서

translation.en: to create the outcome we choose.
All right, well, enough about me. Um…
So, last we spoke, you were struggling a bit with Brian.
I don't know. I have been avoiding him.
Have you considered telling him this?
translation.ko: 브라이언한테 힘들다고 말해볼 생각은 안 했어요?

translation.en: He may be hurt because we still care about each other a lot.
translation.ko: 브라이언이 상처받겠죠 서로를 여전히 많이 아껴요

translation.en: Let me suggest something, and you can take it or leave it,
translation.ko: 제안을 하나 할게요 꼭 받아들여야 하는 건 아닌데

translation.en: but I think you'd be wise to take it. [chuckles]
Invite Brian to your place for dinner tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 브라이언 초대해서 집에서 저녁 같이 먹어요

translation.en: I can think of infinite reasons why not.
Trust me. You'll be on your turf. You can cook a good meal.
translation.ko: 믿어봐요, 제니퍼 영역이잖아요 맛있는 요리를 준비하는 거예요

translation.en: Tell him you got some matters you need to discuss.
I think it'd be very good for you.
But not easy. I mean, I'm not saying that. But-- But good.
translation.ko: 당연히 쉽지는 않겠죠 하지만 도움이 될 거예요

translation.en: you don't have to be a victim anymore.
[Brian] Hey, it's Brian. I got your message.
Let me know if you want me to bring anything. See you soon.
translation.ko: 내가 가져갈 거 있으면 알려줘 이따 보자

translation.en: I mean, I almost killed him at our housewarming party.
translation.ko: 나도 집들이 파티 때 브라이언 죽일 뻔했잖아

translation.en: You're the one who caught it.
-You're probably just in shock. -No, I'm not in shock.
translation.ko: - 아직 충격이 안 가셨나 봐 - 나 멀쩡해

translation.en: I remember being at the store.
And then I'm at home sitting at the table.
Come on. I'm gonna-- I'm gonna take you home.
-[Meade] How long has it been now? -Eight days.
Do you remember anything else from that night?
translation.ko: 그날 밤 일에 대해서 기억은 안 나고요?

translation.en: Is there any way that I could be responsible
Because I can't stop thinking about it.
It's like what we do here.
[inhales] Do you remember what I told you the first time we discussed hypnosis?
translation.ko: 최면 치료를 제안하면서 제가 했던 말 기억나요?

translation.en: That only you have the power, control over your subconscious.
translation.ko: 잠재의식을 통제할 수 있는 힘은 오로지 당신한테만 있다고 했죠

translation.en: and every time we let the world run us, those wounds fester.
translation.ko: 맥없이 세상에 휘둘릴 때마다 상처는 곪아 터지죠

translation.en: But that's a choice based on some preconceived notion
that the world can even run us in the first place.
translation.ko: 세상이 나를 휘두를 수 있다는 선입견이요

translation.en: So, the work we're doing is designed to eliminate that fear,
translation.ko: 즉, 우리는 그 두려움을 없애고자 함께 치료해 나가고 있는 거예요

translation.en: but the moment you start to doubt our work,
So you need to trust me…
[newswoman] This is a terrible turn of events,
as the family is reeling after losing their daughter,
translation.ko: 유족은 딸을 잃은 슬픔에서 헤어 나오지 못하고 있으며

translation.en: and they still have no information from police.
translation.ko: 경찰 측은 어떠한 정보도 제공하지 않고 있습니다
경찰 측은 어떠한 정보도 제공하지 않고 있습니다 포틀랜드 경찰국에서 수사에 착수했습니다

translation.en: into the death of their daughter.
translation.ko: 포틀랜드 경찰국에서 수사에 착수했습니다 "불가사의한 사망에 대한 유족의 보강 수사 요청"

translation.en: She'd recently taken out a restraining order on her psychiatrist.
translation.ko: "불가사의한 사망에 대한 유족의 보강 수사 요청" 최근 심리 치료사를 상대로 접근 금지 명령을 신청했다는 점이

translation.en: Of course, it's been a game-changer to the entire case
as the police are now looking towards finding out further information as what…
translation.ko: "최면을 이용한 괴롭힘" 경찰은 추가 정보를 찾고 있으며…

translation.en: [newsman 2] The study into crimes while under hypnosis
translation.ko: "웨이드 롤린스 형사는 인터뷰를 거절했다" 최면 범죄에 대한 연구 결과가 주 형사법원을 뒤흔들고 있습니다

translation.en: is new to the state criminal court.
translation.ko: 최면 범죄에 대한 연구 결과가 주 형사법원을 뒤흔들고 있습니다
정신과 협회 측에서… "범행 당시 최면 상태였음을 주장"

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know, Jenn. It's just-- I get why you'd be concerned.
I mean, it's not exactly comforting news, but I just-- I don't see it.
translation.ko: 기사들 보고 찝찝할 순 있는데 말도 안 되는 것 같아

translation.en: No, look. It says here in the article,
"Bowen told her family she was experiencing missing time."
translation.ko: '앤드리아 보언은 가족들에게 일부 기억을 잃었다고 말했다'

translation.en: That is what happened to me. It was after I had lunch with Dr. Meade,
translation.ko: 나도 딱 이랬어 그날 점심에 미드 박사가 브라이언을 초대하라고 제안했다고

translation.en: where he suggested I had Brian over for dinner.
translation.ko: 그날 점심에 미드 박사가 브라이언을 초대하라고 제안했다고

translation.en: -It just feels like a big leap. -Look at the background check.
translation.ko: - 한 단계 나아가라는 거지 - 신원 조회 결과를 봐

translation.en: Yes. Look, the only address listed is his office.
There's no private residence, employers, or unpaid parking tickets.
translation.ko: 거주지 주소, 이전 고용주 명단 미납된 주차 위반 벌금도 없어

translation.en: The man is basically a ghost until six months ago
when someone takes out a restraining order. This is his patient,
translation.ko: 치료를 받던 환자가 접근 금지 명령을 신청했어

translation.en: and he is torturing her. Stalking.
translation.ko: 미드 박사한테 괴롭힘을 당했대 스토킹, 정신적 및 정서적 학대!

translation.en: This woman was afraid for her life,
and then three days after she files a restraining order,
translation.ko: 접근 금지 명령을 신청한 지 3일 만에

translation.en: What if there is something else going on?
-What if he did something to her? -Okay. This is where you lose me.
translation.ko: - 박사가 무슨 짓을 했다면? - 됐어, 더는 못 들어주겠다

translation.en: Therapists use hypnotherapy to help their patients quit smoking.
translation.ko: 심리 치료사들은 최면으로 담배나 끊게 도와줄 뿐이야

translation.en: Not to hack into their brains and stop their heart.
translation.ko: 뇌를 조종해서 심장을 멈추게 하지는 않아

translation.en: -This is not a thing. -Yes, it-- Look, I thought that too.
translation.ko: - 그런 일은 있을 수 없어 - 나도 그렇게 생각했는데 아냐

translation.en: In Sweden, a group of teenagers are hypnotized to deal drugs,
translation.ko: 스웨덴에서는 십 대 여럿이 최면 상태에서 마약을 팔았는데

translation.en: In Germany, Zebediah Cantor is hypnotized to rob banks, and he has missing time--
translation.ko: 독일에선 제베다이어 캔터가 최면에 걸려 은행을 털었는데 - 기억을 못 한다고! - 알겠어

translation.en: And this is from that night with Brian.
translation.ko: 브라이언이랑 만나기 직전에 내가 마트에서 산 것들이야

translation.en: I did it on purpose, Gina.
It-- But it wasn't me. It was, it was--
And then I just sat there and watched.
I didn't even move until I came out of it.
translation.ko: 최면이 풀릴 때까지 움직일 수가 없었어

translation.en: Thank you so much for meeting with us, detective, on such short notice.
translation.ko: 저희가 급하게 연락을 드렸는데 만나주셔서 감사합니다, 형사님

translation.en: -We really appreciate it. -What can I do for you?
We wanted to ask you some questions about a woman named Andrea Bowen.
translation.ko: 앤드리아 보언이라는 분에 대해 물어보고 싶어서요

translation.en: Six months ago, she filed a restraining order against Collin Meade.
translation.ko: 6개월 전에 콜린 미드를 상대로 접근 금지 명령을 신청하신 분요

translation.en: I know the case. What's your question?
Her family said that she died of a heart attack,
translation.ko: 유가족 측에서 사인이 심장 마비임을 알고도

translation.en: but then they wanted a broader investigation.
Because Dr. Meade is our therapist.
translation.ko: 저희도 미드 박사한테 심리 치료를 받고 있거든요

translation.en: weird dreams. But they don't feel like dreams.
You've been practicing hypnosis with Dr. Meade, Miss Thompson?
translation.ko: 미드 박사한테 최면 치료를 받고 있나요?

translation.en: Collin Meade was brought in for questioning a week after Bowen's death.
translation.ko: 보언이 사망하고 일주일 뒤에 콜린 미드를 신문했습니다

translation.en: I got a warrant, obtained his patient records.
translation.ko: 영장을 받아서 환자 기록까지 증거로 압수했는데

translation.en: Told I couldn't even finish going through what we had.
Meade was also practicing hypnosis with Andrea.
translation.ko: 앤드리아도 미드 박사에게 최면 치료를 받고 있었어요

translation.en: It's funny. Cops using old witnesses sometimes.
translation.ko: 웃기게도 오래된 사건을 다룰 때 최면 수사를 하기도 합니다

translation.en: Try and get them to remember things they may have seen. [clicks tongue]
translation.ko: 뭘 봐놓고는 잊었나 싶어서 목격자의 기억을 파헤치죠

translation.en: but if you're a victim, claiming someone used hypnosis
translation.ko: 그렇지만 피해자가 누군가 악의를 가지고 최면을 걸었다고 말하면

translation.en: with ill intent, that kinda thing, they'll laugh you out of the room.
translation.ko: 누군가 악의를 가지고 최면을 걸었다고 말하면 경찰들은 배가 찢어져라 웃죠

translation.en: You don't think she died of a heart attack?
Incoming call came from a blocked number.
translation.ko: 발신 번호 표시 제한으로 전화가 왔어요

translation.en: -Her behavior changed when she answered. -That happened to me.
translation.ko: - 전화를 받더니 사람이 달라지죠 - 저도 그랬어요

translation.en: It's the body's reaction to extreme fear.
The body enters paralysis, heart rate increases,
But if it goes on too long, you die.
Maybe, technically, she died of a heart attack,
translation.ko: 사실만 놓고 본다면 사인은 심장 마비가 맞지만

translation.en: but whatever she was seeing in the elevator is what caused it.
translation.ko: 사실만 놓고 본다면 사인은 심장 마비가 맞지만 승강기 안에서 겪은 환각이 심장 마비를 일으켰을 겁니다

translation.en: I think you should find yourselves a new therapist.
I'll talk to you later, okay?
It's just-- You were so worried that something happened with Brian,
translation.ko: 네가 브라이언 일로 걱정이 많다고 하니까

translation.en: He said he was wrong before, and then he thought that it might help me.
translation.ko: 자기가 잘못 판단했다면서 최면 치료가 도움이 될 거랬어

translation.en: We'll do what Det. Rollins said. We'll stay away.
translation.ko: 롤린스 형사님 말대로 다신 엮이지 말자

translation.en: Hey, Dr. Meade, it's Jennifer Thompson. We just saw each other,
translation.ko: 미드 박사님, 제니퍼 톰슨이에요 하루밖에 안 지났지만

translation.en: but I was wondering if you had any last-minute appointments available.
translation.ko: 혹시 오늘 시간 나시면 방문해도 될까 해서요

translation.en: Call me back when you can. Bye.
-I was thrilled to get your call. -Yeah, thanks for squeezing me in.
translation.ko: - 연락받고 기뻤어요 - 그래요? 시간 내줘서 고마워요

translation.en: Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.ko: 특별히 하고 싶은 얘기가 있어서 찾아왔나요?

translation.en: No. Not-- Nothing really, actually. It's just, um,
Brian's not awake yet, and so that's hard.
I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.ko: 잠깐 최면 치료를 하면 도움이 될까 해서요

translation.en: -[phone line trilling] -[Wade] I'm looking for Adrienne Dorsey.
translation.ko: "비상 연락처 전화번호 - 자매" 에이드리엔 도시 계신가요?

translation.en: This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.ko: 포틀랜드 경찰국 소속 웨이드 롤린스 형사입니다

translation.en: I was hoping I could ask you some questions regarding your sister.
translation.ko: 동생분 사건에 대해서 여쭤볼 수 있을까 해서요 "모나 조어"

translation.en: [Meade on recording] Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.ko: 특별히 하고 싶은 얘기가 있어서 찾아왔나요?

translation.en: [Jenn] I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.ko: 잠깐 최면 치료를 하면 도움이 될까 해서요

translation.en: I'm going to ask you some questions, and you're gonna tell me the truth.
translation.ko: 몇 가지 질문을 할 테니 사실대로 답해줘요

translation.en: Why did you really come see me today?
-[Meade] And why are you recording me? -[menacing music]
[Jenn] Because I want to hear what happens during our sessions.
translation.ko: 최면 치료를 하는 동안 무슨 일이 벌어지는지 알려고요

translation.en: -[Meade] Do you not trust me? -[Jenn] No.
[Jenn] Because I know about Andrea Bowen.
[Meade] Is this why you were at the police station this morning?
I assume she knows everything you know.
Thank you for being honest, my love.
-[Scott] Dude, what quarter is it? -[Gina] Tell him to not--
translation.ko: - 제임스, 이따 통화하자고 해요 - 그래, 인마

translation.en: No, they are not up by seven, bro! [laughs]
-I'm serious. Hang up. -I gotta go before she kills me.
translation.ko: - 얼른 끊어, 곧 전화한다고 했어 - 나 지나한테 죽기 전에 끊는다

translation.en: Tell him I told him wassup! Keep me informed. Yeah, okay, peace.
translation.ko: 내 안부도 전해줘 나중에 어떻게 됐나 말해줘, 끊어

translation.en: Girl, I gotta call you back. I have buyers calling any minute.
translation.ko: 젠, 다시 전화할게 바이어 전화 기다리고 있거든

translation.en: -Gina. Gina, where are you? -I'm just in the car with Scott.
translation.ko: 지나, 지금 어디야? 스콧이랑 차에 있어

translation.en: Turn around and go back to the house.
Could you go back to the house? You need to go back, listen to me.
translation.ko: 일단 집으로 돌아가 줄래? 꼭 그래야 해 잘 들어, 운전하면 안 되니까…

translation.en: -Gina, get-- -I'm sorry, you're cutting out. I can't--
translation.ko: 꼭 그래야 해 잘 들어, 운전하면 안 되니까… 미안한데 전화가 자꾸 끊겨서…

translation.en: This is them. I'll call you back.
No, Gina! He knows we were at the police station. He knows!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 그 자식이 알아 우리가 경찰서 갔던 거 안다고!

translation.en: Sorry to bother you, but do you have a moment to chat?
translation.ko: 불쑥 전화해서 미안한데 잠깐 통화할 수 있어요?

translation.en: I'm just in the car with Scott.
[Meade] Even better. Gina, this is how the world ends.
translation.ko: 그럼 더 좋죠 당신의 세상은 이렇게 끝나요
뭘 떼달라는 거야? - 제발 떼줘! - 뭘? 아무것도 없어

translation.en: What? There's nothing there. Get what off?
-Get it off of me! Please! -Gina, relax. Gina!
translation.ko: - 뭘 떼? 진정해! - 내 몸에서 치워!

translation.en: Get it off! Get it off!
Detective Rollins. What a pleasant surprise.
translation.ko: 롤린스 형사님 좀 놀랐지만 잘 오셨어요

translation.en: Gina Kaleman died in a car accident tonight.
translation.ko: 지나 케일먼이 오늘 저녁에 교통사고로 사망했습니다

translation.en: How long was she a patient?
-[Wade] What were you treating her for? -She came to me with some, uh…
translation.ko: 뭘 치료하고 있었습니까? 처음에 찾아왔던 이유는

translation.en: You ever perform hypnosis on Gina?
translation.ko: 지나한테 최면 치료를 하신 적 있나요?

translation.en: Yes. Uh, we performed our first session last week.

translation.ko: - 흔한 공포증을 갖고 있더군요 - 폐소 공포증요?

translation.en: The last claustrophobic patient I dealt with was, uh…
Well, it was Andrea Bowen, actually.
You know what I always loved as a kid?
I'm sure it has something to do with why I became a detective.
translation.ko: 제가 형사가 된 이유 중 하나일 겁니다

translation.en: Putting the pieces together, finding the patterns.
translation.ko: 조각을 맞추고 패턴을 찾아내는 게 좋아서요

translation.en: I looked through some of your patient files today.
translation.ko: 박사님의 예전 환자 기록을 오늘 살펴봤습니다

translation.en: The ones we obtained after Andrea's death.
translation.ko: 앤드리아가 사망한 후에 저희가 압수했던 기록요

translation.en: I got to chat with family members, and I noticed something.
You don't use hypnotherapy on all of your patients.
translation.ko: 박사님은 특정 환자에게만 최면 요법을 쓰더군요
세 사람에게는 동일한 신체적 특성이 있었고

translation.en: and they also all happen to be dead.
Gina Kaleman doesn't match your MO.
translation.ko: 지나 케일먼의 경우엔 범행 수법이 달랐지만

translation.en: I think you had something else in mind when it came to her.
Is there something specific you wanted to talk about tonight, Wade?
translation.ko: 특별히 하고 싶은 말이 있어서 나를 찾아온 겁니까, 웨이드?

translation.en: Because if not, I should be going. It's getting late.
translation.ko: 아니라면 이만 일어나죠 시간이 많이 늦었습니다
최면 요법은 불면증에 탁월한 효과를 보입니다

translation.en: You wanna try it? I'll give you a free session.
translation.ko: 한 번은 무료로 해드릴 테니 해보실래요?

translation.en: Thought you only took female patients.
My phone died, or I would have called.
Um, I heard about your friend.
I just thought I could catch him saying something or doing something.
translation.ko: 어떤 말이나 행동을 하는 순간을 잡아내고 싶었어요

translation.en: He was at the station. He's been following us.
translation.ko: 오늘 오전엔 우리 뒤를 밟아서 경찰서까지 따라왔어요

translation.en: There's a reason he never hypnotized Gina until you started asking questions.
translation.ko: 당신이 이것저것 캐묻자 급하게 지나에게 최면을 걸었죠

translation.en: He knew you would go to her. She got in the way.
translation.ko: 둘이서 상의할 것 같으니 지나를 방해자로 여긴 거예요

translation.en: But not long after Andrea started asking questions, she was dead.
translation.ko: 앤드리아 보언은 의문을 제기하고 얼마 지나지 않아 사망했어요

translation.en: He's not done with you yet, or you would be too.
translation.ko: 당신에겐 아직 무언가가 남아서 살려두는 거고요

translation.en: I got his prints. I'm gonna run 'em, see if we're missing anything.
translation.ko: 놈의 지문을 감식해 볼 거예요 혹시나 뭘 놓쳤다면 나오겠죠

translation.en: I'll call you in the morning.
You don't need to be afraid of me. I just wanna talk.
translation.ko: 나 무서워하지 마 얘기나 좀 하자는 거니까

translation.en: What did I do to you to make you not trust me?
translation.ko: 내가 너한테 뭘 했다고 나를 못 믿어?

translation.en: I invited you in. I listened.
Really, you should be thanking me.
I asked you what you wanted, and I'm working so hard to give you that.
translation.ko: 뭘 원하는지 물어봐 줬고 그걸 이뤄주려고 애쓰고 있다고

translation.en: And Brian and Gina were just gonna get in the way of your dreams.
translation.ko: 브라이언과 지나를 살려뒀다면 당신이 꿈꾸는 걸 방해했겠지

translation.en: Don't worry. He'll be taken care of.
Everything I'm doing is for you, Jennifer.
And I know there's been a lot of
that's just the romantic in me.
[woman on TV] When the police ran his prints,
translation.ko: 경찰의 지문 조회로 그 사람의 진짜 정체가 밝혀졌죠

translation.en: they discovered his real identity. He had changed his name.
translation.ko: 경찰의 지문 조회로 그 사람의 진짜 정체가 밝혀졌죠 이름을 바꿨더군요

translation.en: [man on TV] And who was he, really?
[woman] A killer. Wanted for murder in three states.
[male narrator] Tonight, on The Crime Files.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 '크라임 파일스'에서 다룰 이야기들을 소개합니다

translation.en: seventeen-year-old Victoria Wilson disappeared from her suburban home
translation.ko: 뉴저지주 매투천 교외에 거주하던 17살 빅토리아 윌슨이

translation.en: leaving her parents and four younger siblings
Three days later, her body was found in a forest 300 miles from home.
translation.ko: 3일 후 집에서 480km 떨어진 곳에서 윌슨의 시신이 발견됐습니다

translation.en: So, what happened to Victoria Wilson?
translation.ko: 빅토리아 윌슨에게 무슨 일이 있었던 걸까요?

translation.en: Billy Adler came home from school
to find his mom dead at the dining room table,
The police ruled it a suicide. But Billy knew his mom would nev--
translation.ko: 경찰은 자살로 결론 지었으나 빌리는 부모님이 절대 그럴…

translation.en: I can't tell them I think Meade was involved.
translation.ko: 미드가 연루된 것 같다고 보고할 수 없어요

translation.en: They don't know I've been digging into this.
When Gina and I came to see you, you said something about
translation.ko: 지나랑 같이 찾아갔을 때 형사님이 잠깐 언급했죠

translation.en: A drive-by shooter speeds away from the scene.
translation.ko: 범인이 달리는 차 안에서 총을 쏘고 달아났다고 치죠

translation.en: An eyewitness saw the car but can't remember the license plate.
translation.ko: 누군가 차를 봤는데 번호판은 기억하지 못한다면

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, maybe they do remember it.
So, we send them to a hypnotist who tries to help them recall.
translation.ko: 그런 경우에 기억을 되살리기 위해 목격자를 최면 전문의에게 보내요

translation.en: And that will hold up as evidence?
What if you sent me to whoever you use for that sort of thing?
translation.ko: 그 최면 전문의한테 도움을 청하는 거예요

translation.en: and try to make me recall my sessions with Meade.
translation.ko: 미드 박사와의 치료 세션들을 기억해 낼지도 몰라요

translation.en: -It still may not be enough. -You just said--
Do you know how hard it is to charge someone with murder
translation.ko: 누군가를 살인 혐의로 기소해서 유죄 판결을 받아내는 게

translation.en: But he all but confessed to me that he's responsible for Brian and Gina.
translation.ko: 브라이언과 지나를 해쳤다고 어젯밤에 본인 입으로 말했어요

translation.en: -You recorded it? -He said he was coming after--
With everything else we have, the other victims, the pattern…
translation.ko: 모든 정황이 맞아떨어져요 다른 피해자들, 범행 패턴

translation.en: He's planning something. I know he is.
I don't know what, but the way he was talking last night--
translation.ko: 근거는 없지만 어젯밤에 말하는 게 꼭…

translation.en: I assume she knows everything you know.
Well, thank you for being honest, my love.
I'll take all of your concerns into consideration.
And then he cuts it short.
How much do you really know about hypnotherapy?
Well, it's an incredibly powerful tool.
When handled with care and integrity,
it can be a force for good.
But in the wrong hands, hypnosis can be dangerous.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 오용하면 아주 위험해질 수 있어요

translation.en: some trust issues with your profession right now.
translation.ko: 박사님을 믿고 최면에 걸려도 될지 잘 모르겠어요

translation.en: Jenn, I understand that this may not be worth much,
I'm one of the good ones.
And I'm only gonna have a look around.
Just see what the subconscious retained from those sessions with Dr. Meade.
translation.ko: 미드 박사와의 치료 세션에 대해 잠재의식이 뭘 기억하는지만 보죠

translation.en: [doctor] Focus on the sound of the metronome,
And as you feel the weight of your body
I want you to let everything go.
Let the world around you slow down.
[doctor] Now, I want you to tell me everything you remember
translation.ko: 이제부터 떠오르는 기억들을 모조리 얘기해 주세요

translation.en: from your sessions with Dr. Collin Meade.
translation.ko: 콜린 미드 박사와의 치료 세션에서 어떤 일이 있었죠?

translation.en: I need you to listen to the sound of my voice
and come back to this room right now!
I've never seen anything like that.
He must have planted some sort of
In case anybody ever tried to do what we're doing.
translation.ko: 이런 방법을 시도할 때를 대비한 거예요

translation.en: And I have no way of knowing
how many sustained post-hypnotic suggestions he placed.
translation.ko: 제니퍼의 머릿속에 후최면 암시를 얼마나 심어놨을지 알 수 없어요

translation.en: And these can be triggered at any given moment.
translation.ko: 그러한 암시는 언제든 작동할 수 있어요

translation.en: There's one more thing I could try.
Look, I can't remove all of his suggestions,
translation.ko: 미드 박사가 걸어둔 암시는 건드릴 수 없지만

translation.en: but maybe I could plant something of my own.
I swear to God, this is the last time I'm doing this.
translation.ko: 진짜 이번만 하고 최면은 때려치울 거예요

translation.en: But I found out that Meade has a mentor named Xavier Sullivan.
translation.ko: 근데 미드가 엑세비어 설리번이 자기 멘토라고 말한 적 있어요

translation.en: [Wade] Yeah, it was a CIA project in the '60s.
[Jenn] Well, Sullivan is a hypnotist. And the CIA had recruited him
translation.ko: 설리번은 최면 전문의예요 CIA에서 설리번을 영입해서

translation.en: to use hypnosis to plant false memories in people.
translation.ko: 최면으로 사람들 머릿속에 가짜 기억을 심게 했대요

translation.en: I'm on my way to see him.
[Wade] No, Jenn, that's not a good idea.
[Jenn] He might know something about Meade that can help us.
translation.ko: 미드에 대해서 뭔가 알겠죠 도움이 될 거예요

translation.en: -[Wade] Just wait for me. -[Jenn] We don't have time.
translation.ko: - 내가 갈 때까지 기다려요 - 시간이 없어요

translation.en: My wife was such a beautiful woman,
but then so are you, Jennifer.

translation.ko: - 이게 어떻게 된 거지? - 엑세비어는 내 아버지야

translation.en: He left me this place when he died.
[man] Hey, Rollins. I ran the prints from that spoon.
translation.ko: 롤린스, 지난번에 준 스푼에서 지문을 채취해 감식해 봤어요

translation.en: They belonged to a man named Julian Sullivan.
[Jenn's voice] You reached Jenn Thompson. Leave a message.
-[Wade] Jenn, where are you? -Rollins, it was Meade.
-His real name is Sullivan. -Jenn, tell me where you are.
He brought me back to his office.
-[Wade] But where is he? -Door is locked. I don't know!
translation.ko: - 그 자식은 어디 있고요? - 문이 잠겼어요, 몰라요

translation.en: I'm sending units now. Hey, taxi! [groans]
I'll never forget that first time I saw you.
translation.ko: 당신을 처음 본 순간은 평생 못 잊을 거야

translation.en: -Give me something. -[man] We've entered the building.
There's nothing quite like a woman's scent.
The moment you catch it, it's just…

translation.ko: 해당 층으로 와서 사무실로 접근 중입니다

translation.en: and they seemed right at first,
they just weren't meant to be.
What are you waiting for? Get in!
[Meade] I mean, I see why now, though.
And now I have you all to myself.
-Sir, there's no one here. -What do you mean there's no one there?
translation.ko: 형사님, 아무도 없습니다 아무도 없다니 무슨 말이야?

translation.en: He wanted her to call me.
I need a residential address to one Xavier Sullivan.
I'm not thrilled you started biting your nails again.
translation.ko: 다시 손톱을 죄다 물어뜯어 놓으면 어떡해?

translation.en: We'll have to work on that.
I was hoping you'd recognize it.
Oh, they were your memories with her.
You put them in my head
because you're trying to replace her.
The memory, planted in the mind,
given the right amount of care and attention,
will blossom into a whole new reality.
Make someone believe they're somewhere they're not or,
translation.ko: 자아를 지우고 다른 존재로 살게 하는 것도

translation.en: you know, paralyze from head to toe,
-Oh my gosh, a very young age. -Your father?
translation.ko: - 와, 진짜 어렸을 때야 - 아버지한테 배웠겠지

translation.en: Father, mentor. Interchangeable for a young boy. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 아버지나 멘토나 어린 소년한테는 그게 그거지

translation.en: Your loss of Brian and your son Daniel.
and the life I thought we'd have together.
We will be that for each other.
translation.ko: 이제 당신하고 그 삶을 살 거야

translation.en: [Meade] You don't happen to know today's date, do you?
Now you know why I waited.

translation.ko: - 안 돼 - 제니퍼, 꽉 붙잡고 있어

translation.en: -Where is he? -He went out the back.
-I'm trapped. You have to help me. -[Wade] The door is locked.
translation.ko: 나 못 움직여요, 도와줘요 문이 잠겼어요

translation.en: I have to go find him. You're gonna be okay.
What? No, no, no! Rollins, no!
Please don't go! You can't go! Please don't go!
[panting] Okay. Come on. Just focus. Focus.
-[Jenn gasps] -That's it, wake up. That's it. No.
-Where is he? Where is he? -He's gone.
I called in for backup. They'll be here shortly.
In the recording you played me,
[Meade] Thank you for being honest, my love.
If you are ever under a post-hypnotic suggestion
by Dr. Collin Meade, and he refers to you as "my love,"
translation.ko: 콜린 미드 박사가 '내 사랑'이라고 부르는 순간

translation.en: every single trigger he put into your head.
And you will see the world around you
Hey, hey! Wake up. Please wake up.
No, no, no! Hey, hey, hey! Hi.
Right here. Look at me, look at me. Look at me, look at me. Yes.
Hi, hi! You're okay, you're okay.
Stay-- Yeah. Stay with me. Hi. You're okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.ko: 정신 잃으면 안 돼요 나 봐요, 괜찮을 거예요

translation.en: [Jenn] I can hear them. I hear sirens. They are coming. It's okay.
translation.ko: 사이렌 소리가 들리네요 다 왔나 봐요, 괜찮아요

translation.en: You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay.
I think it's great. We present it to the team at Monday's meeting.
You'll like the new place. You don't have to. I understand.
translation.ko: 당신도 새집 좋아할 거야 안 좋아해도 괜찮아

translation.en: I know you're very particular about your things.
I'm sorry I didn't share my grief with you.
translation.ko: 내 슬픔을 당신과 나누려 하지 않았어

translation.en: I'm sorry that I thought losing Daniel
was harder for me than it was for you.
And I know it's not my fault what happened to him.
translation.ko: 대니얼한테 일어난 일이 내 잘못이 아닌 것도 알아

translation.en: No matter how much I wanna blame myself.
But it is my fault what happened to us.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리한테 일어난 일은 내 잘못이야

translation.en: And for that, I'm really, truly sorry.
The doctors say your tests are promising.
And when you wake up, I'll be sitting right here.
translation.ko: 당신이 일어나는 순간에 내가 여기 있을 거야

translation.en: I left you alone, but I did wanna say thank you
translation.ko: 그때 이후로 처음 보죠? 고맙다고 말하고 싶었어요

translation.en: I wasn't sure when I'd see you again, but…
I figured you'd come around eventually.
